attributes.action: end rip off Great Britain , protect us from over priced and second rate products and services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we pay over the odds for just about everything in this country,from not getting refills in fast food restaurants to really bad broadband service. the watchdogs are failing us and seem to be serving the companies they are supposed to police, selling off our airwaves after the digital switchover proves that. end it now

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
